org.apache.james.protocols.api

Interface StreamResponse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Response
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FutureStreamResponseImpl, POP3StreamResponse

    public interface StreamResponse
extends Response
    Special Response sub-type which allows to write an InputStream to the remote peer

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.james.protocols.api.Response

        DISCONNECT

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream getStream()
      Return the stream which needs to get written to the remote peer.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.james.protocols.api.Response

        getLines, getRetCode, isEndSession

    • Method Detail

      • getStream

        InputStream getStream()
        Return the stream which needs to get written to the remote peer. This method should only be called one time (when the data is written to the client) as it returns the same InputStream on every call. So once it is consumed there is no way to re-process it.
        Returns:
        stream
